text: Duniyam ra paralokaka kurako sambandhama, ra anathaharuko barema pani sodhchan, tapa'i bhanidinus ki jasama tiniharuko (arthika) sudhara hos, tyo nai ramro cha. Timiharule uniharuko mala aphno malasanga bhandarana garnuma pani kehi harja chaina. Kinabhane tini timra dajubha'iharu hun. Asala niyata ra badaniyatala'i allaha ramrari bujhdacha. Yadi allahale caheko bha'e timila'i kastama parna sakdathyo. Nihsandeha allaha saksama ra sarvasakti sampanna cha
